questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Find indices of two numbers in an array that add up to a specific target.

questions.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
questions.description: Find the median of two sorted arrays combined into one sorted array.

questions.title: Rotate Image
questions.description: Rotate a square matrix 90 degrees clockwise in place.

questions.title: Subarray Sum Equals K
questions.description: Find the number of contiguous subarrays that sum up to a given integer K.

questions.title: Validate Binary Search Tree
questions.description: Determine if a binary tree is a valid binary search tree.

questions.title: Binary Tree Vertical Order Traversal
questions.description: Return the vertical order traversal of a binary tree's nodes' values.

questions.title: 0/1 Knapsack
questions.description: Maximize the number of strings formed using limited 0s and 1s (knapsack variant).

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.description: Find the longest substring in a given string that is a palindrome.

questions.title: Binary Search
questions.description: Implement binary search to find a target in a sorted array.

questions.title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
questions.description: Find the length of the longest increasing subsequence in an array.

questions.title: Coin Change
questions.description: Find the fewest number of coins needed to make up a given amount.

questions.title: Word Break
questions.description: Determine if a string can be segmented into words from a dictionary.

questions.title: LRU Cache
questions.description: Design and implement a Least Recently Used (LRU) cache.

questions.title: Number of Islands
questions.description: Count the number of islands in a 2D grid.

questions.title: Course Schedule
questions.description: Determine if all courses can be finished given prerequisites.

questions.title: Merge Intervals
questions.description: Merge all overlapping intervals in a list.

questions.title: K Closest Points to Origin
questions.description: Find the K closest points to the origin in a 2D plane.

questions.title: Trapping Rain Water
questions.description: Compute how much water can be trapped between bars of different heights.

questions.title: Sliding Window Maximum
questions.description: Find the maximum in each sliding window of size K.

questions.title: Edit Distance
questions.description: Find the minimum operations to convert one word to another.
